00018 #include <math.h>
00019 #include <boost/tokenizer.hpp>
00020 #include <iostream>
00021 #include <fstream>
00022 #include <votca/csg/csgapplication.h>
00023 #include <votca/csg/trajectorywriter.h>
00024 
00025 using namespace std;
00026 using namespace votca::csg;
00027 
00028 class CsgMapApp
00029     : public CsgApplication
00030 {
00031 public:
00032     string ProgramName() { return "csg_map"; }
00033     void HelpText(ostream &out) {
00034         out << "Map a reference trajectory to a coarse-grained trajectory.\n"
00035             "This program can be used to map a whole trajectory or to\n"
00036             "create an initial configuration for a coarse-grained run only.";
00037     }
00038 
00039     bool DoTrajectory() { return true;}
00040     bool DoMapping() { return true;}
00041 
00042     void Initialize() {
00043         CsgApplication::Initialize();
00044         AddProgramOptions()
00045             ("out", boost::program_options::value<string>(),
00046                 "  output file for coarse-grained trajectory")
00047                 ("hybrid", "Create hybrid trajectory containing both atomistic and coarse-grained");
00048     }
00049 
00050     bool EvaluateOptions() {
00051         CsgApplication::EvaluateOptions();
00052         CheckRequired("trj", "no trajectory file specified");
00053         CheckRequired("out", "need to specify output trajectory");
00054         return true;
00055     }
00056 
00057     void BeginEvaluate(Topology *top, Topology *top_ref);
00058 void EvalConfiguration(Topology *top, Topology *top_ref) {
00059         if (!_do_hybrid) {
00060             // simply write the topology mapped by csgapplication classe
00061             _writer->Write(top);
00062         } else {
00063             // we want to combinge atomistic and coarse-grained into one topology
00064             Topology *hybtol = new Topology();
00065 
00066             BeadContainer::iterator it_bead;
00067             ResidueContainer::iterator it_res;
00068             MoleculeContainer::iterator it_mol;
00069             InteractionContainer::iterator it_ia;
00070 
00071             hybtol->setBox(top->getBox());
00072             hybtol->setTime(top->getTime());
00073             hybtol->setStep(top->getStep());
00074 
00075             // copy all residues from both
00076             for (it_res = top_ref->Residues().begin(); it_res != top_ref->Residues().end(); ++it_res) {
00077                 hybtol->CreateResidue((*it_res)->getName());
00078             }
00079             for (it_res = top->Residues().begin(); it_res != top->Residues().end(); ++it_res) {
00080                 hybtol->CreateResidue((*it_res)->getName());
00081             }
00082 
00083             // copy all molecules and beads
00084           
00085             for(it_mol=top_ref->Molecules().begin();it_mol!=top_ref->Molecules().end(); ++it_mol) {
00086                 Molecule *mi = hybtol->CreateMolecule((*it_mol)->getName());
00087                 for (int i = 0; i < (*it_mol)->BeadCount(); i++) {
00088                     // copy atomistic beads of molecule
00089                     int beadid = (*it_mol)->getBead(i)->getId();
00090 
00091                     Bead *bi = (*it_mol)->getBead(i);
00092                     BeadType *type = hybtol->GetOrCreateBeadType(bi->getType()->getName());
00093                     Bead *bn = hybtol->CreateBead(bi->getSymmetry(), bi->getName(), type, bi->getResnr(), bi->getM(), bi->getQ());
00094                     bn->setOptions(bi->Options());
00095                     bn->setPos(bi->getPos());
00096                     if (bi->HasVel()) bn->setVel(bi->getVel());
00097 
00098                     mi->AddBead(hybtol->Beads()[beadid], (*it_mol)->getBeadName(i));
00099 
00100                 }
00101 
00102                 if (mi->getId() < top->MoleculeCount()) {
00103                     // copy cg beads of molecule
00104                     Molecule *cgmol = top->Molecules()[mi->getId()];
00105                     for (int i = 0; i < cgmol->BeadCount(); i++) {
00106                         Bead *bi = cgmol->getBead(i);
00107                         // todo: this is a bit dirty as a cg bead will always have the resid of its first parent
00108                         Bead *bparent = (*it_mol)->getBead(0);
00109                         BeadType *type = hybtol->GetOrCreateBeadType(bi->getType()->getName());
00110                         Bead *bn = hybtol->CreateBead(bi->getSymmetry(), bi->getName(), type, bparent->getResnr(), bi->getM(), bi->getQ());
00111                         bn->setOptions(bi->Options());
00112                         bn->setPos(bi->getPos());
00113                         if (bi->HasVel()) bn->setVel(bi->getVel());
00114                         int mid = bparent->getMolecule()->getId();
00115                         mi->AddBead(bi, bi->getName());
00116                     }
00117                 }
00118                 
00119             }
00120            hybtol->setBox(top_ref->getBox());
00121 
00122             _writer->Write(hybtol);
00123         }
00124     }
00125 
00126     void EndEvaluate() {
00127         _writer->Close();
00128         delete _writer;
00129     }
00130 
00131 protected:
00132     TrajectoryWriter *_writer;
00133     bool _do_hybrid;
00134 
00135 };
00136 
00137 void CsgMapApp::BeginEvaluate(Topology *top, Topology *top_atom) {
00138     string out = OptionsMap()["out"].as<string > ();
00139     cout << "writing coarse-grained trajectory to " << out << endl;
00140     _writer = TrjWriterFactory().Create(out);
00141     if (_writer == NULL)
00142         throw runtime_error("output format not supported: " + out);
00143 
00144     _do_hybrid = false;
00145     if(OptionsMap().count("hybrid")){
00146         if (!_do_mapping)
00147             throw runtime_error("options hybrid and no-map not compatible");
00148         cout << "Doing hybrid mapping..." << endl;
00149         _do_hybrid = true;
00150     }
00151 
00152 
00153     _writer->Open(out);
00154 };
00155 
00156 int main(int argc, char **argv)
00157 {
00158     CsgMapApp app;
00159     return app.Exec(argc, argv);
00160 }
